revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Whirl Islands |image = [[File:Whirl Islands.png|300px]] |caption = An inside view of Whirl Islands. |tokens = 5,000 |location = On Route 41, south of Olivine City. }} '''Whirl Islands''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Johto]]. It has 36 tiles arranged in a 6x6 square, including 6 chest tiles, 15 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile.
==Dungeon Stats==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Pokémon !! Base Health |- | Random Encounter || 92,800 |- | Dewgong (Boss) || 340,000 |- | Kingler (Boss) || 340,000 |- | Lugia (Boss) || 660,000 |}
==Pokémon==
* Zubat * Golbat * Seel * Krabby * Horsea * Dewgong (boss) * Kingler (boss) * Lugia (boss)
==Items==
{| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Chance to Find |- | {{Bag3|X Attack}} [[X Attack|xAttack]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|X Click}} [[XClick|xClick]] || 33% |- | {{Bag3|Lucky Egg}} [[Lucky Egg]] || 33% |}
